channel.title: Easy RSC Adventurer Issue
channel.description:
Hey, when I talk to the adventurer in Easy RSC nothing happens. I looked at his file and it says he can be interacted with and teleport players but nothing happens.
Anyone know why? Thank you.

item.title: Easy RSC Adventurer Issue
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“Zecronious, post:3, topic:475387”]Thanks a bunch, I spent like an hour trying to work that one out. Makes a lot of sense though.
Also you’re right, wrong section. face palm Guess a mod will move it, my bad.

For anyone who’s reading this and wants to know the fix.

1. Find the Adventurer.class in your bin folder.
EasyRSC\Server\bin\org\rscdaemon\server\npchandler

2. Go to NPCHandlers.xml in your conf folder.
C:\Users\Kyle\Downloads\EasyRSC\EasyRSC\Server\conf\server

3. Make a new entry using this directory.


208

org.rscdaemon.server.npchandler.Adventurer

A new entry should be intuitive if you read the others.[/quote]

You’re welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Easy RSC Adventurer Issue

@Zecronious wrote:

Thanks a bunch, I spent like an hour trying to work that one out. Makes a lot of sense though.
Also you’re right, wrong section. face palm Guess a mod will move it, my bad.

For anyone who’s reading this and wants to know the fix.

1. Find the Adventurer.class in your bin folder.
EasyRSC\Server\bin\org\rscdaemon\server\npchandler

2. Go to NPCHandlers.xml in your conf folder.
C:\Users\Kyle\Downloads\EasyRSC\EasyRSC\Server\conf\server

3. Make a new entry using this directory.


208

org.rscdaemon.server.npchandler.Adventurer

A new entry should be intuitive if you read the others.

item.title: Easy RSC Adventurer Issue
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Link the adventurer class to the adventurer NPC ID in your XML file.

You also posted this in wrong section.

Read full topic
